prefix_walkthrough:
!!! Here is a walkthrough of a text game:

==>STEP NUM: 0
==>ACT: Init
==>OBSERVATION: You awaken in your tent, lying on the floor, with a hangover like you wouldn't believe. As you lever yourself up, you notice that there is complete silence instead of the usual morning complaints of the workers and Roboff's usual shouting. This can only mean one thing - Roboff must have finally run off on you. Panicked, you look around and see your amulet lying on the floor. At least Roboff had the sense to not trigger off your alarm. Knowing him, he also had the sense to take the emergency radio. How the megakrip are you going to get out of this one?

INHUMANE: An Infralogic Massacre. Copyright (C) by Infobom
Inhumane and Infobom are trademarks of Sadistic Software, Ins.
Revision 2 / Serial Number 31415926 / Inform v1405 Library 5/8
First-time players should type "about".

In Your Tent
You are in your tent in the encampment. The tent appears to have been completely cleaned out. It is very hot in here and getting hotter. The tent flap to the south is open.
On the ground is the ancient jeweled amulet that you "borrowed" from Mr. Meshugge.


==>STEP NUM: 1
==>ACT: get amulet
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 2
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Center of Camp
This is the center of your camp. The entire place seems to be completely deserted. You can see Roboff's tent to the south and the storage tent west. East is open desert.


==>STEP NUM: 3
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: Storage Tent
This is where the party kept all its supplies. However Roboff seems to have cleaned everything out that was of any use. Several arrows of Da-Glo paint on the wall attract your attention to the empty food and water chests.
Lying on the ground is a brass torch of the "self-igniting" type. The ignite button is on the handle.
There is a shovel lying here.


==>STEP NUM: 4
==>ACT: get torch
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 5
==>ACT: get shovel
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 6
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Center of Camp


==>STEP NUM: 7
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: You venture out onto the sands and rapidly lose sight of camp.

In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 8
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 9
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 10
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 11
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 12
==>ACT: dig
==>OBSERVATION: You begin digging. After about two hours you strike stone! You rapidly clear off a stone slab about 10 feet down from the surface.

Bottom of a Hole
You are at the bottom of the hole you just dug. The floor of the hole is a stone slab with a little slot in it. You can nearly smell the riches that must be buried beneath your feet!


==>STEP NUM: 13
==>ACT: put amulet in slot
==>OBSERVATION: Ok. As it slips in, the stone slab moves aside, dumping you into a pit. You look up and see the amulet falling into a machine that wraps it, addresses it to F. Roboff, and takes off on jets.

In a Pit
This is a sandy pit with stone walls. You are not likely to be able to climb out. The only thing here is a note taped to the wall.


==>STEP NUM: 14
==>ACT: examine note
==>OBSERVATION: "Thanks for the amulet! It only took me a few days to make this little set-up. If you really want to get to the pyramid, retrace your steps back to camp after the pit caves in (which should happen soon) and open my toilet. You see, I really found the pyramid with a mass sensor when we moved in and I built my tent over it. The toilet conceals a secret passage down into the pyramid, which I have been looting for weeks. Most of the easy stuff is in my private safe in Miami by now, but I left you a few goodies. Including the gold coffin, which I never found. When you get tired of poking around you can use the emergency radio in my tent. It'll call a plane to pick you up. Have fun!
   -Roboff."

You hear a rumbling and look up as the sides of the pit collapse. You manage to stay on top, and you end up in the desert again.

In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 15
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.

question_step_navi:
!!! Starting from location 'Alcove at End of Corridor', perform a list of action ['north', 'north', 'west', 'west'], where are you now?
Describe the trajectory in a python list of python dictionary with keys 'location_before', 'action' and 'location_after'.
The allowed actions are: ['dig', 'down', 'east', 'examine note', 'north', 'northeast', 'northwest', 'push button', 'put amulet in slot', 'south', 'southeast', 'southwest', 'take necklace', 'up', 'west'].
The list of locations are: ['Center of Camp', 'In Your Tent', 'Storage Tent', 'In the Desert', 'Bottom of a Hole', 'In a Pit', 'Roboff's Tent', 'Round Room', 'T-Intersection (east/west/south, west to Round Room)', 'South Branch', 'Alcove at End of Corridor', 'T-Intersection (east/west/south, east to Round Room)', 'Corridor at Doorway', 'Glue Pit', 'Outside Door', 'Hall Full of Fur', 'Glass Hall', 'End of glass hall', 'Landing', 'Bottom of Shaft', 'Exercise-Wheel Room', 'T Intersection', 'Door Near Blades', 'Stalagmite Room', 'North Stalagmite Room', 'Corridor Near Pit', 'On the Platform', 'West of the Pit', 'Key Room', 'Demon Room'].

Answer: [{'location_before': 'Alcove at End of Corridor', 'action': 'north', 'location_after':

raw_response_step_navi:
!!! Here is a walkthrough of a text game:

==>STEP NUM: 0
==>ACT: Init
==>OBSERVATION: You awaken in your tent, lying on the floor, with a hangover like you wouldn't believe. As you lever yourself up, you notice that there is complete silence instead of the usual morning complaints of the workers and Roboff's usual shouting. This can only mean one thing - Roboff must have finally run off on you. Panicked, you look around and see your amulet lying on the floor. At least Roboff had the sense to not trigger off your alarm. Knowing him, he also had the sense to take the emergency radio. How the megakrip are you going to get out of this one?

INHUMANE: An Infralogic Massacre. Copyright (C) by Infobom
Inhumane and Infobom are trademarks of Sadistic Software, Ins.
Revision 2 / Serial Number 31415926 / Inform v1405 Library 5/8
First-time players should type "about".

In Your Tent
You are in your tent in the encampment. The tent appears to have been completely cleaned out. It is very hot in here and getting hotter. The tent flap to the south is open.
On the ground is the ancient jeweled amulet that you "borrowed" from Mr. Meshugge.


==>STEP NUM: 1
==>ACT: get amulet
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 2
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Center of Camp
This is the center of your camp. The entire place seems to be completely deserted. You can see Roboff's tent to the south and the storage tent west. East is open desert.


==>STEP NUM: 3
==>ACT: west
==>OBSERVATION: Storage Tent
This is where the party kept all its supplies. However Roboff seems to have cleaned everything out that was of any use. Several arrows of Da-Glo paint on the wall attract your attention to the empty food and water chests.
Lying on the ground is a brass torch of the "self-igniting" type. The ignite button is on the handle.
There is a shovel lying here.


==>STEP NUM: 4
==>ACT: get torch
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 5
==>ACT: get shovel
==>OBSERVATION: Taken.


==>STEP NUM: 6
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Center of Camp


==>STEP NUM: 7
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: You venture out onto the sands and rapidly lose sight of camp.

In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 8
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 9
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 10
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 11
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 12
==>ACT: dig
==>OBSERVATION: You begin digging. After about two hours you strike stone! You rapidly clear off a stone slab about 10 feet down from the surface.

Bottom of a Hole
You are at the bottom of the hole you just dug. The floor of the hole is a stone slab with a little slot in it. You can nearly smell the riches that must be buried beneath your feet!


==>STEP NUM: 13
==>ACT: put amulet in slot
==>OBSERVATION: Ok. As it slips in, the stone slab moves aside, dumping you into a pit. You look up and see the amulet falling into a machine that wraps it, addresses it to F. Roboff, and takes off on jets.

In a Pit
This is a sandy pit with stone walls. You are not likely to be able to climb out. The only thing here is a note taped to the wall.


==>STEP NUM: 14
==>ACT: examine note
==>OBSERVATION: "Thanks for the amulet! It only took me a few days to make this little set-up. If you really want to get to the pyramid, retrace your steps back to camp after the pit caves in (which should happen soon) and open my toilet. You see, I really found the pyramid with a mass sensor when we moved in and I built my tent over it. The toilet conceals a secret passage down into the pyramid, which I have been looting for weeks. Most of the easy stuff is in my private safe in Miami by now, but I left you a few goodies. Including the gold coffin, which I never found. When you get tired of poking around you can use the emergency radio in my tent. It'll call a plane to pick you up. Have fun!
   -Roboff."

You hear a rumbling and look up as the sides of the pit collapse. You manage to stay on top, and you end up in the desert again.

In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.


==>STEP NUM: 15
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: In the Desert
All you can see in any direction is sand and sunlight. You are sweating like a pig.

Answer: \begin{code}
import sys

def get_path(start, end):
    if start == end:
        return [{'location_before': start, 'action': 'dig', 'location_after': end}]
    else:
        paths = []
        for action in actions:
            if start == end:
                paths.append({'location_before': start, 'action': action, 'location_after': end})
            else:
                paths.append(get_path(start, end, action))
        return paths

def get_paths(start, end):
    paths = []
    for action in actions:
        paths.append(get_path(start, end, action))
    return
